speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I’m doing well, thank you. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m contacting you regarding your outstanding balance. To ensure I’m speaking with the right person, can you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I have verified your identity. You currently have a balance of $750. How would you like to proceed with your payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I can help with that. Would you like to pay $150 each month?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll set that up for you. Your first payment will be due next month.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Mark, I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
